description:
Bright and spacious 1 Bedroom in a traditional Brownstone in the heart of Clinton Hill Brooklyn! Close to G, A, and C trains. Abundance of Cafes, Bars and Restaurants.

The love that goes into it...
name: Bright and Spacious room in Clinton Hill
review: We had a beautiful stay. Valdet was very accomodating during the booking process and welcomed us warmly in her home.
